About Me

My passion for art spans beyond my BFA in graphic design from BGSU. It lives in experimental design & hand-crafted projects—my work is driven by the power of collaboration and the importance of determination. I’m always intrigued by projects that allow me to showcase my artistry, and I intend to never stop learning along the way.

lilamartydesign@gmail.com | 419.460.3238
